verses.roman:
agaṇya, ananta yata aṇḍa-sanniveśa
tata-rūpe puruṣa kare sabāte prakāśa

synonyms: agaṇya—innumerable; ananta—unlimited; yata—all; aṇḍa—universes; sanniveśa—groups; tata-rūpe—in as many forms; puruṣa—the Lord; kare—does; sabāte—in every one of them; prakāśa—manifestation.
translation: The puruṣa enters each and every one of the countless universes. He manifests Himself in as many separate forms as there are universes.
